title: CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_DUI_HANDLE
content:
0xB135472B// CreateRuntimeTextureFromDuiHandle
long CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_DUI_HANDLE(long txd, char* txn, char* duiHandle);Parameters:txd: A handle to the runtime TXD to create the runtime texture in.txn: The name for the texture in the runtime texture dictionary.duiHandle: The DUI handle returned from GET_DUI_HANDLE.Returns: The runtime texture handle.Creates a runtime texture from a DUI handle.
codeBlocks:
// CreateRuntimeTextureFromDuiHandle
long CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_DUI_HANDLE(long txd, char* txn, char* duiHandle);
